COLD_triggered: A chill runs through you. Your fingers grow stiff and numb from the cold.
The bitter wind cuts through you, sapping your warmth.
Your breath becomes visible. Ice crystals form on your eyelashes.
Numbness creeps into your extremities as the cold bite increases.
Your body shivers uncontrollably. The cold is becoming dangerous.
Frost spreads across your skin. You're dangerously close to freezing.
The cold seeps into your bones, making every movement labored.
Your teeth chatter as the frigid air steals your body heat.
A bone-deep cold settles over you. Warmth feels like a distant memory.
The icy air burns your lungs with each breath.
Shivering violently, you struggle to maintain your core temperature.
The relentless cold drains your strength with each passing moment.
Your skin prickles painfully as the temperature drops further.
Cold sweat beads on your forehead despite the freezing conditions.
You can barely feel your hands anymore. The cold is overwhelming.
ICY_triggered: Your entire body shivers uncontrollably. The cold bites deep into your bones.
Dangerous cold penetrates through all your layers. You need warmth immediately.
Ice crystals form on your clothing. Your extremities are going numb.
The brutal cold saps your strength with frightening speed.
You can no longer feel your fingers or toes. Hypothermia threatens.
Each breath of freezing air feels like knives in your lungs.
Your muscles lock up from the intense cold. Movement becomes painful.
FREEZING_triggered: Your teeth chatter uncontrollably and your limbs go numb.
If you don't find warmth and shelter immediately, you will freeze to death.
Deadly hypothermia sets in. Your body is shutting down from the cold.
You can barely move. The freezing cold is killing you.
Everything feels distant and hazy as hypothermia takes hold.
Your thoughts slow to a crawl. The cold is winning.
Death by freezing is imminent unless you find warmth now.
HUNGER_triggered: Your stomach growls insistently. You need to find food soon.
Hunger gnaws at your belly, making concentration difficult.
Your energy reserves are depleting. Food would be welcome.
Pangs of hunger wrack your body. You need to eat.
Weakness spreads through you from lack of nourishment.
Your stomach cramps painfully. The need for food is urgent.
Lightheadedness accompanies the gnawing emptiness in your belly.
Every thought turns to food. Hunger dominates your awareness.
Your hands tremble from lack of nourishment.
The hollow ache in your stomach grows unbearable.
STARVING_triggered: Your body trembles with weakness. You desperately need food.
You won't survive much longer without food.
Severe hunger weakens every muscle. Your body is consuming itself.
Vision blurs at the edges. Starvation is taking its toll.
Your strength ebbs away. Food is no longer optionalâ€”it's critical.
Every movement feels like wading through deep water. You're starving.
Your body screams for sustenance. Find food or perish.
DYING_OF_HUNGER_triggered: Your vision blurs and darkness creeps at the edges.
Without food immediately, death is certain.
Your body is shutting down from starvation. This is the end.
Muscle wasting and organ failure set in. You need food now.
The world spins around you. Starvation claims another victim.
You can barely stand. Death from hunger is moments away.
THIRST_triggered: Your throat feels parched and dry. You should find water.
Thirst makes your tongue feel thick and swollen.
Your lips are dry and cracked. Water would be wonderful.
A persistent thirst distracts you from other concerns.
You swallow with difficulty. Your mouth is so dry.
The need for water grows with each passing moment.
Dehydration begins to set in. Find water soon.
DEHYDRATED_triggered: Your lips crack and your tongue swells. You need water urgently.
Severe dehydration impairs your thinking. Everything feels sluggish.
Your skin loses its elasticity. Dangerous dehydration sets in.
Vision swims and darkens. Your body desperately needs water.
Every breath is labored. Dehydration weakens you dramatically.
You can barely produce saliva. Water is critical now.
DYING_OF_THIRST_triggered: Your body is shutting down from dehydration. Every breath is agony.
Organ failure from dehydration is imminent. You're dying of thirst.
The world fades in and out. Death by dehydration is certain.
Your body has no more moisture to give. This is the end.
Consciousness slips away. You need water immediately or you'll die.
TIRED_triggered: Your eyelids grow heavy and you stifle a yawn. Rest would be welcome.
Fatigue begins to settle into your bones.
A weariness creeps over you. Sleep sounds appealing.
Your steps slow slightly. You could use some rest.
Mild exhaustion makes everything feel just a bit harder.
You suppress another yawn. Tiredness is catching up with you.
VERY_TIRED_triggered: Exhaustion weighs on you like a heavy cloak. You need to rest soon.
Your limbs feel heavy. Rest is becoming necessary.
Each movement requires more effort than it should.
You stumble slightly. Fatigue affects your coordination.
Sleep calls to you insistently. You need rest.
EXHAUSTED_triggered: Your body screams for rest. You can barely keep your eyes open.
You stumble with every step. Extreme exhaustion overwhelms you.
Fatigue clouds your mind and weakens your body.
Your limbs feel like lead. Continuing seems impossible.
You can barely stand. Sleep is no longer optional.
Weariness threatens to overwhelm you completely.
Every fiber of your being demands rest. You must sleep soon.
You fight to stay conscious as exhaustion pulls at you.
Your body is shutting down from lack of rest.
Extreme fatigue makes even breathing feel labored.
HOT_triggered: Sweat beads on your forehead as heat presses down on you.
You need to cool off. The heat is uncomfortable.
The oppressive warmth makes you feel sluggish.
Heat radiates from all around. You're getting too warm.
Perspiration soaks through your clothes. It's too hot.
The temperature rises uncomfortably. You need shade or water.
Uncomfortably hot, you seek relief from the heat.
OVERHEATING_triggered: The heat is overwhelming. Your head pounds and your vision swims.
Find shade and water quickly. You're dangerously overheated.
Heat exhaustion sets in. Your body struggles to cool itself.
Dizziness and nausea wash over you. The heat is too much.
You're on the verge of heat stroke. Cool down immediately.
The relentless heat drains your strength rapidly.
Your body temperature climbs dangerously high.
HEAT_STROKE_triggered: Your skin burns like fire and confusion clouds your thoughts.
Your body is failing. You need water and shade now or you will die.
Critical heat exhaustion. Your organs are shutting down.
Delirium sets in from the extreme heat. Death is imminent.
Your body can no longer regulate temperature. You're dying.
Heat stroke ravages your system. Find help immediately.
WET_triggered: Your clothes cling damply to your skin, chilling you to the bone.
Water soaks through your clothes, making you uncomfortable.
Your gear is dripping wet. Discomfort spreads throughout.
Damp clothes cling to your skin uncomfortably.
Moisture seeps through every layer. You're thoroughly wet.
Cold wetness makes your skin clammy and unpleasant.
Water squelches with each step. You need to dry off.
SOAKED_triggered: Water drips from every inch of you. Your sodden clothing weighs you down.
The cold seeps deep through your soaked garments.
You're drenched to the bone. The dampness is miserable.
Completely soaked, your equipment and movement are impaired.
Every layer is saturated. You desperately need to dry off.
Your sodden clothing weighs you down heavily.
Wet fabric chafes against your skin with every movement.
WIND_CHILLED_triggered: Bitter wind tears through your clothing, stealing your warmth.
You need shelter from this gale.
Harsh wind cuts through you, rapidly draining body heat.
The relentless wind makes the cold unbearable.
Wind chill accelerates heat loss dangerously.
You struggle against the fierce wind. Shelter is critical.
FAINTED_triggered: Darkness swallows you as your body gives out. You collapse, unconscious.
Your vision goes black. The world disappears as you faint.
Consciousness slips away. You crumple to the ground.
Your body can take no more. You lose consciousness.
Everything goes dark as you collapse from exhaustion.
SUFFOCATION_triggered: Your lungs burn as you struggle for air.
Breath comes in desperate gasps. You're suffocating.
Panic sets in as oxygen becomes scarce.
Your chest tightens. The air grows thin and useless.
Darkness creeps at the edges of your vision from lack of air.
You claw desperately for breath, finding none.
Your body screams for oxygen it cannot find.
Consciousness begins to fade as suffocation takes hold.

LIT_FIRE_triggered: The dancing flames warm your skin and lift your spirits. You feel safer here.
Fire crackles cheerfully, providing welcome warmth and comfort.
Heat radiates from the fire, slowly thawing your chilled body.
The firelight pushes back the darkness and cold. You feel hope return.
Blessed warmth spreads through you as the fire does its work.
Your spirits lift as the fire's warmth envelops you.
NATURAL_SHELTER_triggered: You find respite from the elements here. The shelter blocks the worst of the weather.
Natural protection surrounds you, reducing exposure to harsh conditions.
This sheltered spot offers relief from wind and precipitation.
You settle into the natural shelter, grateful for its protection.
The elements cannot reach you as easily here. You feel more secure.
GOOD_SHELTER_triggered: This shelter provides good protection. You feel secure from the elements.
You can rest easier here, well-protected from the weather.
Quality shelter surrounds you, significantly reducing weather exposure.
The strong shelter blocks wind, rain, and cold effectively.
You breathe easier in this well-protected space.
This is a good place to weather the storm.
EXCELLENT_SHELTER_triggered: You are completely protected here. The weather cannot touch you.
You can truly rest in comfort, immune to the elements.
This excellent shelter provides total protection and comfort.
The weather rages outside, but you are perfectly safe within.
Complete protection from all weather. You could stay here indefinitely.
This shelter is a sanctuary from the harsh world outside.

weather_change_to_rain: Dark clouds gather overhead. The first drops of rain begin to fall.
Rain starts to patter against you, growing steadier.
A downpour begins, drenching the area.
The sky opens up. Rain falls in sheets.
Droplets multiply quickly. You're caught in a rainstorm.
Thunder rumbles as rain sweeps across the land.

The weather turns wet. Rain drums steadily down.
weather_change_to_snow: Snowflakes begin to drift down from the gray sky.
The air grows colder as snow starts to fall.
White flakes swirl around you. A snowstorm is coming.
Snow blankets the ground with increasing speed.
The world turns white as snow falls heavily.
Gentle snowfall becomes a blizzard within moments.
Ice crystals fill the air as the snow intensifies.
Winter's grip tightens. Snow falls thick and fast.
weather_change_to_clear: The clouds part. Sunlight breaks through at last.
Clear skies emerge as the weather improves.
The storm passes, leaving calm in its wake.
Weather clears. The sky becomes bright and welcoming.
The oppressive weather lifts. Visibility improves dramatically.
enter_cold_area: Biting winds assault you as you enter this frozen realm.
The temperature drops sharply. Your breath mists in the frigid air.
Cold surrounds you completely. This place is unforgiving.
You step into a zone of bitter cold. Ice crunches underfoot.
Freezing air hits you like a physical force.
The chill here is profound. Winter reigns absolute.
Your warmth drains away rapidly in this arctic environment.
Frost covers everything here. The cold is dangerous.
enter_hot_area: Heat washes over you as you enter this sweltering zone.
The temperature soars. Sweat beads on your skin immediately.
Oppressive heat surrounds you. The air shimmers.
You step into blazing warmth. Breathing becomes labored.
Intense heat radiates from all directions.
The scorching environment saps your energy quickly.
Air thick with heat makes every movement exhausting.

The air is heavy with humidity. Mist clings to you.
Puddles and streams cover the ground. This area is thoroughly wet.
